title: PSA: You can still Downvote Threads
body:
Just go to the Boards Home, sort by new, and then downvote any threads you dislike.

For whatever reason, our mods (~~and people who have no idea about GD whatsoever but force change upon us~~) decided to make the new changes only on GD. So things outside GD still function normally, including downvotes.

There is no way to downvote once inside a thread though.
